message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40% and keeping 60% for myself.
My turn.  I'll take a slight majority to make up for the inflation. This is a good deal for both of us.
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept less than 55%. This is a fair deal considering the inflation.
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
